docs.title: Phenoviz
docs.text: • This is a tool for visualizing and analyzing phenotypic data of microbial growth and can be visualizaed as a growth curve.

docs.title: 🗣️ Chat with PDFs (RAG)
docs.text: Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation chatbot using LangChain & Streamlit.

docs.title: 🧠 Sentiment Analysis Bot
docs.text: Trained BERT model to classify Urdu tweets with 90% accuracy.

docs.title: 🧹 Data Cleaning Dashboard
docs.text: Cleaned 100k+ rows of agricultural data using Pandas and Streamlit.

docs.title: 📈 Price Prediction
docs.text: Used Linear Regression and Random Forest to predict crop prices with 85% accuracy.
